Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 4/4/1985, off Rick Reuschel (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1985, off Jose Alvarez (MON)...
Traded from Chicago to St. Louis on 7/31/1985 (Going to STL: C Jody Davis, 1B Leon Durham. Going to CHC: C Tom Pagnozzi, C Carlton Fisk, CF Brian Harper)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,100,000 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/11/1987 to a 2-year deal worth $1,750,000 per year...
9/28/1988: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $1,500,000 per year, for 3 years.
Injured on 5/22/1990 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
